com.qtplaf.library.ai.fuzzy

Interface Function

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Linear

    public interface Function
    The function to compute the value (factor) within the range of a segment in fuzzy control.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getFactor(double value, double maximum, double minimum, int sign)
      Returns the factor of the argument value within the range of the segment.

    • Method Detail

      • getFactor

        double getFactor(double value,
                 double maximum,
                 double minimum,
                 int sign)
        Returns the factor of the argument value within the range of the segment.

        If sign == 0, then the factor must be:

        • 1 if value == (maximum-minimum)/2
        • 0 if value <= minimum
        • 0 if value >= maximum
        If sign == 1, then the factor must be:
        • 0 if value <= minimum
        • 1 if value >= maximum
        If sign == -1, then the factor must be:
        • 1 if value <= minimum
        • 0 if value >= maximum
        Parameters:
        value - The value to compute.
        maximum - The maximum value.
        minimum - The minimum value.
        sign - The sign, -1, 0 or 1.
        Returns:
        The factor.
